Effortlessly build performant APIs

Fully featured

Everything that's needed to build modern APIs, from data serialization and validation to websockets, ORM integration, session and authentication management

Performant

Starlite puts great emphasis on performance and is amongst the fastest ASGI frameworks in end-to-end tests.

(a)synchronous

Fully compliant with the ASGI specification, Starlite is asynchronous at heart, but synchronous execution is not a second class citizen: All user facing parts support both synchronous and asynchronous code without performance penalties

Opinionated yet flexible

Strongly encourages best practices, but tries to not get into the way of adapting it into whatever solution is needed
